title: Zellerfeld CEO: Want to be 'Foot Locker of the Future'
description: Cornelius Schmitt, Zellerfeld CEO, discusses 3D-printed shoes and how AI is disrupting the future of footwear with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” He says he wants the company to become the “Foot Locker of the future.” (Source: Bloomberg)
